Articles.Content:
make jeb scream for his life WITHOUT making the ship blowup

show pics a proof

P.S. i will try this my self soon i cant atm

Make an explosion close to the ship.

Or does that fall under \'without blowing up the ship\' as well?

Make an explosion close to the ship.

Or does that fall under \'without blowing up the ship\' as well?

it depends, was that part of the ship? if it was then yes
it was decouplers that the engines stood on before liftoff

Would a separated stage exploding count as well? I don\'t know how else to do it, or if it\'s even possible otherwise. The man is a legend for a reason

Edit; just whipped together the highest-G inducing craft I could think of (pod + small fuel tank + bertha engine) and it doesn\'t faze the man. Around 50G I think, it\'s too short so the end mission screen doesn\'t display it.

Would a separated stage exploding count as well? I don\'t know how else to do it, or if it\'s even possible otherwise. The man is a legend for a reason

Edit; just whipped together the highest-G inducing craft I could think of (pod + small fuel tank + bertha engine) and it doesn\'t faze the man. Around 50G I think, it\'s too short so the end mission screen doesn\'t display it.

yes that counts too, this challenge is meant to be hard
I suppose I could try and get that mad g stage in space and see if it does it there. But I think it\'s actually impossible
]so i have to make jeb scared? can i fly stupidly to do so?
Cool, what did you do to them?
i just flew like a insane person till jeb freeked out

Could I suggest some post merging by a moderator please?

PD
I\'ve done this about six times before. If you come in at a steep angle with only the pod, Jebediah will scream like a baby without a pacifier.
Now try and make Jeb scream but have at least one of the other two kerbals remain happy or indifferent. I.e. can we get him screaming without making them all scream?

Now try and make Jeb scream but have at least one of the other two kerbals remain happy or indifferent. I.e. can we get him screaming without making them all scream?

great idea, this is now the new challenge
